p:
Subsequently, the reaction mixture was placed on an ice bath for 15 min to cease the reaction, and then, 4 mL of butanol was added to the mixture, with subsequent vortexing followed by centrifugation at 3000 rpm for 5 min, according to the method described by Campos et al. [ 50]. The absorbance of the supernatant was recorded using a spectrophotometer (Quimis, Diadema, SP, Brazil) at 532 nm. The content of MDA is expressed as nmol/mL, obtained using
